featuredRaw.title: MHGUTree
featuredRaw.description: Web Project to visualize all 10.000+ Weapons available in MHGU, and how to craft them, as a tree structure

featuredRaw.title: GW2Stats
featuredRaw.description: Web Project that lets you view the inventories of all your characters without having to log in. I created it as an exercise in working with APIs.

featuredRaw.title: D2RRuneCalc
featuredRaw.description: Web Project for Diablo 2 to list all existing Runecrafts, and show which Items are craftable with the runes currently owned

featuredRaw.title: conclurer/midnightboard
featuredRaw.description: University Project for the development of a digital notice board, using Vue.js as the frontend and Sails.js as the backend.
